outline:
1. he, she, it
    1. (emphasising and resuming subject)
    2. (anticipating subj)
    3. as demons pron
    4. (relative)
    5. (affirming existence)
strongs_def: {he (she or it); self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are}
